attributes.action: scrap plans to re-value housing and penalise those of us that have improved our homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The council TAX home revaluation will see an increase in tax to all those that have improved and looked after thier homes. Those that let thier homes degrade will be rewarded with lower council TAX.

Where is the incentive for me to invest in my home ?

Because i have improved my home does that mean i will use more council services ? Of course not.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
